ratings.comment: I study CS, SO the humanities aren't really my niche. That said, while I struggled through the first few short writing assignments zadas guidance was instructive and thorough. I was able to hone-in on the areas that were in need of improvement. She made sure to get me on the right track and I'm grateful. I didn't think I'd be so engaged
She comes off judgemental when students don't say things that she agrees with and docks points very easily from assignments. Quick to dismiss and discount the work of her students. Quite inflexible.

Zada is a caring, knowledgable, and passionate TA! She wants everyone to not only succeed but have meaningful discussions during class that leave everyone feeling satisfied and with clear understandings of course readings and expectations. This was her first semester-- I can only imagine she'll be even better moving forward!
One of the best TAs Ive ever had. Such a good attitude and wants to see you become your best self. She really cares and puts in the effort.

Zada led discussions for American Environmental History 460. She was the most amazing teacher who truly loves history and her students. Her enthusiasm every day allowed for the most engaging class discussions I have experienced. I am not into history but I would take another history class just to have her as a teacher again. 10/10 recommend
